alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 3:38PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Oglala Lakota, west central Jackson and southeastern Pennington Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 337 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southwest of Badlands National Park, or 43 miles north of Pine Ridge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potato Creek and Interior. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains
